channel.title: Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Shipping smarter agents with every new model
item.description: Discover how SafetyKit leverages OpenAI GPT-5 to enhance content moderation, enforce compliance, and outpace legacy safety systems with greater accuracy . Link to article: https://openai.com/index/safetykit

item.title: A People-First AI Fund: $50M to support nonprofits
item.description: Applications are now open for OpenAI’s People-First AI Fund, a $50M initiative supporting U.S. nonprofits advancing education, community innovation, and economic opportunity. Apply by October 8, 2025, for unrestricted grants that help communities shape AI for the public good. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/people-first-ai-fund

item.title: Why language models hallucinate
item.description: OpenAI’s new research explains why language models hallucinate. The findings show how improved evaluations can enhance AI reliability, honesty, and safety. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/why-language-models-hallucinate

item.title: GPT-5 bio bug bounty call
item.description: OpenAI invites researchers to its Bio Bug Bounty. Test GPT-5’s safety with a universal jailbreak prompt and win up to $25,000. Link to article: https://openai.com/gpt-5-bio-bug-bounty

item.title: OpenAI and Greek Government launch ‘OpenAI for Greece’
item.description: OpenAI and the Greek Government have launched “OpenAI for Greece” to bring ChatGPT Edu into secondary schools and support responsible AI learning. This partnership aims to boost AI literacy, fuel local start-ups, and drive national economic growth. Link to article: https://openai.com/global-affairs/openai-for-greece

item.title: Expanding economic opportunity with AI
item.description: OpenAI is launching a Jobs Platform and new Certifications to connect workers with jobs, training, and certifications. Learn how we’re expanding economic opportunity and making AI skills more accessible. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/expanding-economic-opportunity-with-ai

item.title: Vijaye Raji to become CTO of Applications with acquisition of Statsig
item.description: Vijaye Raji will step into a new role as CTO of Applications, reporting to CEO of Applications, Fidji Simo, following the acquisition of Statsig. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/vijaye-raji-to-become-cto-of-applications-with-acquisition-of-statsig

item.title: Building more helpful ChatGPT experiences for everyone
item.description: We’re partnering with experts, strengthening protections for teens with parental controls, and routing sensitive conversations to reasoning models in ChatGPT. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/building-more-helpful-chatgpt-experiences-for-everyone
